choices: a female fur
A male fur
A Herm Fur
A human Male
A human Female
1.content:
You have your tickets, you just went through the turnstile and up ahead of you is the centerpiece of the park, a 120 foot statue of a lion, painted in gold. It glimmers light from it onto the rest of the theme park, its up to you to explore, find the surprises in the park, either survive or thrive... or end up nestled in some horrible fate...

But what are you....
1.title: What are you

choices: A 5'6" vixen
A 3'4" timid squirrel
A 6'6" plump bovine
A 5'7" busty bunny gal
A 10'9" dragoness
11.content:
You're a fem fur fatale. At least that's how you think of yourself.

But what species are you?
11.title: Fem Fur

choices: "The Jungle"
"The Arctic"
"The Swamp"
111.content:
Your name is Kylie, and you were almost bursting with excitement! The small mountain town you lived in was usually completely boring, with nothing much to do in the way of excitement. But this summer, you had heard a new theme park was opening up! You had always dreamed of an amusement park coming to your town; it would be the perfect way to liven up the area. You and your anthro wolf friend, Judy, had planned to visit the park the very day it opened -- and that day had finally come. You were now driving along on the hour-long trip to meet Judy at the park, for what you expected to be your funnest trip in years.

However, the park was in a bit of an odd location. Usually tourist traps like these tend to be well-advertised, but this one seemed like it was trying to be as far out of the way as possible. The path to the park was composed of completely empty back roads, with nothing in sight but forests. You’d never been around this part of town before -- in fact, you didn’t know this kind of area existed. It was about as far away from the rest of society as it possibly could be. You didn’t pass by any buildings along the way, or even any other cars. There wasn’t even any billboards advertising the park. You couldn’t imagine a place this hidden away could get very much business. It was so far out of the way, in fact, that you were growing worried that your map may be wrong, until you finally see the silhouette of a ferris wheel over the horizon.

As you drew closer, you finally got a good look at the park. You were expecting it to be kind of dump, but it actually looked like a real park. There was a huge ferris wheel and some rollercoasters visible in the distance, and above the entrance was a huge steel sign, ‘THEME PARK OF THE HUNGRY’. The only thing that worried you was how old it looked. The paint was peeling off the buildings of the park, with huge bushes and vines overtaking their walls. You were worried it was abandoned until you saw the employee manning the ticket booth.

You parked, and judging from the absence of other cars, it seemed like you were the first one here today. You got out and stood on the concrete in front of the park, waiting for Judy to show up before you went in. It was taking her a while, but you remained patient, as this park was so strangely positioned that it was easy to get lost on the way here. After a few minutes, you get a text message from Judy herself.

═══════════{ /center}
| Where are you? It’s been twenty minutes.
I could ask you the same question. I’ve been standing right at the gates. |

| So have I!
| Are you at the right place? What does the sign say?

It says I’m at the ‘Theme Park of the Hungry’. |
It’s the only amusement park listed on my map. |

| What the hell?
| Check again. That can’t be right.
What do you mean? |

| Hold on…
| Yeah, there is no ‘Theme Park of the Hungry’. It doesn’t exist on ANY maps.
If you’re messing with me, I’m just going in without you. |

| I’m serious! Look it up!
I don’t have time for this. |

═══════════


You put your phone away with a grumble. If she wanted to play mind games, she can mess with someone else. You were just here to enjoy the park.

As you approached the ticket booth, the first thing you noticed was a total lack of ticket prices being listed. The second thing you noticed was the employee at the booth. His eyes were dark, like he hadn’t slept in a long time. He had long black lines along his face, as if he was some kind of puppet, but at second glance it seemed like it was just face paint. You approached him, trying to keep up a cheerful demeanor despite growing more uncomfortable. “Hello!” You smiled, half-heartedly, leaning on the counter. “Could you tell me how much tickets cost here? I’m not interested in a membership or anything, I just want to-”

“On our opening day, all visitors get in free,” He interuppted, not even turning to look at you, his voice eerily monotone - almost robotic. “Here’s your ticket.”

“Oh, uh, great!” You laughed, a bit confused, as you took the ticket. You eventually work up the courage to ask, “By the way, why does this place look so, uh… worn down? Didn’t it just open today?”

“The original park is old. Older than you could possibly imagine,” He replied in that same indifferent tone. “We’re in the process of restoring it to its former glory.”

“Alright, well, uh, thanks!” You waved as you walked past, stepping into the park itself. You wanted to ask the employee more questions, but he kind of creeped you out. You guessed he wasn’t very good at his job. The park itself was only more ominous. A completely empty amusement park was creepy enough -- it was even creepier when the place looked 100 years old. But you try to be optimistic; you had the whole park to yourself! Since you never had the money to actually rent a park, this may be a once in a lifetime opportunity. You grabbed a map from one of the stalls, a map that looked just as old and tattered as the rest of the park. You figure you only had an hour or two to yourself before the rest of the guests would arrive, so you had to make your first ride count. There appeared to be three different sections of the park -- where to first?
111.title: This is Probably a Bad Idea

choices: The Arctic Vixen's Ride
Photo-shoot with a chubby polar bear
Go to the aquarium to feed the orcas...
1112.content:
You decided that since it was quite a hot summer season, you decided to try out the arctic section first...

As you enter the section, you notice the area is quite frigid and half-wished that you should of bought a sweater or coat with you...but then again, it IS an arctic area of the park...

You notice three attractions right off the bat. The first one being a roller coaster like ride that is named "The Arctic Vixen's Ride" though, you don't exactly know why it was named that...Then you noticed a building hosting a photo-shoot. The sign outside of the building talks about posing with a chubby polar bear for a souvenir back...Again, not sure why you want to pose a picture with such a big bear in the first place...and finally, there is a path towards a huge aquarium area where a sign talks about feeding the orcas for fun...You have to admit that this one seems kind of fun, but you also worry that it could be dangerous to be around such mammoth fishes...

After thinking this through for a moment, you decided to head towards...
1112.title: "The Arctic"

choices: The Swimming Pools
The Water Slides
The Watercraft Rides
1113.content:
You decide to head to the “Swamp” section first. The sign boasts that it ‘focuses on feral preds’. Whatever that means.

You walk into that section of the swamp, and realize it’s a sort of water park based on swamps. It lived up to its title - the water appears murky and green, you could hear frogs ribbiting and crickets chirping, and the air smelled pungent. It was just like a real swamp! At first, you got a bit disappointed. You didn’t expect that there would be a water park, so you didn’t bring a swimsuit. Fortunately, the rules oddly specified that clothing was optional in “the Swamp”, so you just stripped naked and left your clothing on your chair. It’s not like there was anybody around, anyway, and you didn’t want to overheat in the sweltering heat of the swamp.

You stretched as you relaxed on your chair for a bit. You had never really seen a water park like this. You hardly knew where to begin…
1113.title: "The Swamp"

choices: Hippo's Pride Slide
Serpentine Slide
11132.content:
You start scaling the immense structure the water slides jut out from. From the looks of them, they were the biggest water slides you’d ever seen! You were sure glad you weren’t afraid of heights. You climb the stairs easily, as you don’t have to worry about any lines. When you get to the top, you notice that there didn’t seem to be any employee overseeing the slides. You also notice that the slides are so high that their bottom halves are completely obscured by the tree canopies. Thus, you couldn’t see where the slides actually led. But they had to just lead into one of the swimming pools… right?

While the slides were huge, they were limited in numbers. There were only two, in fact; a grey one and green one. The grey one, ‘Hippo’s Pride Slide’ advertises an interesting gimmick. Apparently, along the slide, there are multiple paths that can be chosen. In order to make it to the bottom of the slide, the riders need to choose the correct paths. It doesn’t specify what happens to those who choose the wrong paths, but it is implied that their fate has something to do with hippos. On the other hand, the green one, ‘Serpentine Slide’ has an even more vague set of rules. All it recommends is to ‘make it out the other side before it’s too late’! Interestingly, the green slide is particularly thin -- it looked like you could hardly fit inside.

Which slide do you ride?
11132.title: The Water Slides

choices: You're hungry! Head to one of the park's food courts
Add later
113.content:
Your udder quivers as you insert your ticket into the the turnstyle. Then you squeeze your fat, black and white spotted body throught the turnstyle. Your bovine hooves clomping loudly on the pavement as you enter the park.

You clutch the park map in your three fingered hoof-like hand as you decide where to go.
113.title: Beefy Fun In The Park

choices: The cashier says, "Right away mam."
Something hits you in the back of the head and you black out
1131.content:
One of your stomachs growl and you rub the side of your low hanging udder as you enter the food court. You approach one of the fast food restaurants and look at the human male behind the cash register.

The cashier smiles pleasantly and says, "Welcome to the Hungry Glutton. Can I take your order mam?"

You smile at the human and let out a faint moo before you respond, "Yes, I'd like a medium anthro wolf and a large soda please."
1131.title: Food Court Fun

choices: Shove the wolf's head into your mouth
Shove the wolf's feet into your mouth
11311.content:
The cashier turns around and enters a door on the other side of the counter while you wait for him to get your food.

The cashier went out the back door of the fast food restaurant and quickly hid in the shadows. He stealthily watched as humans and furs of different species entered the food court for several minutes until he spotted what he was looking for.

...

The 5 foot tall anthro wolf's stomach growled as he approached the food court. He was still trying to decide if he was going to order an anthro pig or a human woman when the cashier dashed out of the shadows like a ninja. Before the wolf even knew he was there the cashier hit the wolf man in the back of the head with a blackjack.

The wolf groaned and slumped unconcious before the cashier lifted him onto his shoulders and dashed back into the fast food restaurant.

...

Your patience was rewarded as the cashier returned carrying an unconcious anthro wolf over his shoulders. You licked your bovine lips at the sight of the delicious wolf as the cashier set the unconcious wolf down on the counter. The cashier then grabbed a large empty soda cup and filled it.

You eagerly paid the cashier before you picked up your soda and the wolf then headed for an empty table in the food court.
11311.title: Health Code Violations

choices: A 6'7" muscular wolf...
A slender, 5'4" meerkat...
A fat, 7'9" tiger...
A well-hung 6'10" horse...
A nerdish, 3'6" mouse...
12.content:
You're a beastly stud of a guy... Or at least you are confident enough in yourself to think of yourself as such... You've been wanting to come here for a long time, not just because of the amazing rides and delicious food, but because of the cute workers as well... Plus, the rumors about this place and the hint of danger make it attractive...

What species are you?
12.title: A male fur

choices: Head for a ride...
Go towards the games and attractions...
You notice the park has a water park attached to it!
121.content:
A bit of an amusement park buff, you had heard about this place shortly after you moved here. Your name was Jacob, although you generally went by Jake, as you wanted to distance himself from a character in a certain series of books and movies that he had the misfortune of resembling. Fortunately, most people you met here derided the books, so you knew you had made a good decision to go to college here.

But that wasn't the reason you was here today.

You LOVED amusement parks. Whenever you had the time and money, you made a point of going to visit whatever amusement park you could. Your favorites so far have been Cedar Point in Ohio and Walt Disney World (you would never admit it out loud, but you have had a crush on Princess Jasmine ever since the first Aladdin movie. It may have just been a tigress actress, but it was still a thrill to see her in person), but this one sounded promising.

The rides had been featured on a lot of travel shows, and the food was famous in cooking shows as well. Plus the rumors of people disappearing, rumored to become part of the menu, and the high turnover rate of workers made this enticing to the predator in you.

Certainly, that mousegirl ticket taker you bought your season pass from looked as delicious as she was cute.

You look up at the lion statue and grin. "Hunger Park, huh... Well, we'll see who's hungrier..."

You looked around, taking note of two people who might be potential competition. One was a fat-bellied tiger named Michael you had befriended on your first day in town. He had a reputation as a very successful predator, as his large gut attested to. The other was an absurdly well-hung stallion named Dorian with a reputation as the biggest Cassanova on campus. (You thought he was absurdly well-hung, at any rate. You aren't averse to an encounter with a cute guy, and you feel you have rather impressive 'equipment' yourself, but Dorian was built like hyper-fetish art online. The rumor was that he could eat people with his cock...)

You grin. All in all, it looks like things will be interesting today. And if nothing else, the park looks like it's going to be a blast...
121.title: A 6'7" muscular wolf...

choices: Play some games, win some prizes...
Go to the food court...
Go stalking prey in the video arcade...
123.content:
You fumble a little past the gate, and eventually the apologetic gatekeepers let you in through a side gate instead of through the rotating device that most everyone else used. You didn't mind. A heavily successful pred like yourself, a literally huge tiger named Michael, you took pride in your tremendous gut, knowing that you had it because of the large amount of people that had disappeared into your gut, making you taller and most of all, fatter.

Including several employees of this park.

Honestly? You were surprised that you was still allowed here, considering how many of your meals came from this place.

But every time, you were let in without complaint, and you walked out with some of the staff in your stomach. You weren't as interested in action as some preds, although you wasn't averse to it.

The rumors about this place intrigued you, although you never really encountered anything bizarre. There were, however, some areas that made you very nervous, setting your hackles on end. As well as some mascots that, despite their cuteness, made you nervous.

To your amusement, you saw a rival pred, some well-hung sex addict stallion named Dorian, taking an interest in one of the mascots that made you nervous. You had heard a rumor that he could eat people with his cock, and was wondering if he planned to eat the mascot that way. You had decently sized equipment yourself, made thicker by your fat, but you weren't as absurdly over-endowed and honestly couldn't visualize it.

You look up at the main statue, and nod at it, tipping an imaginary hat to the lion statue, which was rumored to be the founder of the park. You then look around, wondering what to do first. You weren't as interested in some of the rides as most were, since you couldn't FIT in most of them (and besides, you had severe acrophobia, to the point where just LOOKING at a roller coaster made you dizzy) but you were very good at games. You could always go to the food court, you liked regular food as much as you did prey. The water park was always promising...

Hell, you could just go hunting at the arcade, like you usually do.
123.title: A fat, 7'9" tiger...

choices: Try to eat the DDR buck before leaving...
Try to eat the two chubby bunnies.  They're near the other exit...
Trust your instincts and run.  There's other prey...
1233.content:
You decide to head for your favorite hunting grounds, the video arcade. Plenty of delicious, chubby nerds and the occasional inattentive and bored-out-of-their-skulls worker made for a primo hunting ground. Waddling through the park, you pick up a snack along the way at the roasted nuts stand to tide you over. The mousegirl running the stand seemed to greatly enjoy the site of your flabby bulk waddling by, and you make a note of it for later in case you get in the mood for some action as well as food.

You eventually come to one of the many arcades in this park. It's your favorite because it's inside a building and has bad lighting, perfect for concealing even someone as large as you. Perfect for making people disappear.

Calmly, you polish off the last of the nuts, cramming them all into your mouth at once and crushing the paper cone they had come in. You throw it away, and saunter into the darkness of the arcade, brief flashes of illumination coming from the multitude of screens. You smirk, as they make your already impressive bulk look even more sinister.

You carefully take in every detail of the arcade, noting the types of prey at each game station, taking in how easy it would be to sneak up on them. You tended to prefer smaller breeds, as they were easier to catch and/or overwhelm with your sheer size. The larger prey are tempting, but you didn't get as fat as you are by taking chances. That giga-dicked horse you saw earlier was proof-positive that a larger beed could be a pred.

You eventually spot two possible choices for your first meals. A slender, well-built deer playing Dance Dance Revolution, wearing himself out by playing on hard mode but doing quite well, score-wise, getting a perfect win with each round. You figure that once he was done, you could grab him when he stepped off to rest. You lick your lips, admiring his muscular frame. You like eating atheletes, they tended to wriggle quite nicely once inside your belly.

Looking around some more, you spot a pair of geeks off in a corner by themselves, playing an old Mutation Nation game. You blink, a little surprised that a game that old was still in arcades, but you guess that this place could afford pretty much any game they wanted. The two of them looked to be twin brother rabbits, the only difference you could see between them being their outfit colors. Both were plump, and completely wrapped up in their game, oblivious to anything around them. So engrossed were they, that they didn't notice the squirrel babe that sauntered by them, or that their shirts were riding up their mouth-wateringly chubby bellies.

You chuckle, licking your lips. There were other possibilities, but those looked like the best places to start.

After a moment, though, you feel a sudden chill go through you. Was something watching you? Something that thought your chubby ass would be a tasty treat?

You bite your lip. You want to eat someone, but your instincts are telling you it's dangerous to stay...

Maybe you can grab someone before leaving?
1233.title: Go stalking prey in the video arcade...

choices: Eat those tasty bunnies...
Exit discreetly.  There's lots of prey here today...
12331.content:
You want to leave, your instincts telling you there's something dangerous here, something that might be able to eat you. But your pride wins out. You just can't leave empty handed. Or empty-bellied, as it were.

Keeping to the shadows, doing your best to stay away from where the feeling of danger is strongest, you make your way over to the DDR machine, where the handsome, buff buck is finishing the last bonus level, dancing up a storm. In fact, he was dancing so rapidly you were amazed his hooves weren't breaking the dance pad. He was clad only in a pair of jean shorts, his shirt wrapped around the bracing bar. He had no antlers, but from the time of year, you guess that he's shed them. A second look shows that he's already developed little nubs of antlers.

That works out for you, as antlers are hard to digest and usually have to be broken off.

You stay in the shadows behind the machine, expertly using the flashing colors to camoflague your immense bulk. Patiently, you wait for the buck to finish, which he did with a flourish, getting a 100% perfect score and cheers from the crowd. You applaud as well, the buck picking up his shirt and wiping his forehead with it.

You lean forward a little. "Great job. You look beat, though, lemme buy you a drink," you say, motioning for the buck to follow.

The buck grinned, waving to his friends as he set off with you. "Thanks man," he said, "My best score yet, but man I'm beat."

You chuckle, leading him into the darkness behind the machines. "Why we goin' this way?" the buck asked, not suspecting anything yet.

You give him an honest answer. "It's easier for me to go behind the machines... I'd be apologizing every ten seconds if I moved through the crowd."

The buck snickered. "Makes sense. 'Cause no offense dude, you got a massive ass."

"Among other things," you quip without missing a beat, "Care to guess how I got this big?"

The buck shrugged. "Should be pretty obvious. I mean, a big fat tiger..." The buck trailed off. You smirked, and turn around. The two of you are behind a racing game with enclosed booths, big enough to hide you both. The expression on the buck's face is priceless.

"Aw shit..." he says, looking directly into your golden eyes, a 'headlights' effect kicking in, locking him in place.

Smirking, you reach down and grab him, opening your jaws wide and shoving the buck into them headfirst. The buck finds his head inside your hot, wet maw, your steamy breath, stinking of past meals, washing over his face. Gagging a little, he tries to bring his strong, muscular arms up to push his way free, but you have both some muscle of your own underneath your vast amounts of flab, plus you have a good grip on his arms as well as leverage in your favor, the buck held up against your soft, flabby chest.

Purring, you push the buck's head further into your jaws, until you feel your throat grip him. You then swallow, feeling the buck's head get pulled inward. You work the smaller male's shoulders into your jaws, murring and slurping at his bare chest. You're still a bit nervous about the presence in the arcade, but you're determined to enjoy this meal.

The buck, meanwhile, is struggling desperately, wriggling desperately against the hot, wet gullet that surrounded him. He wondered fearfully why no one was helping him, why no one noticed the huge tiger eating him. He wailed, a swallow bringing him into the tiger's gullet up to his elbows, the tiger's paws releasing him now that he was stuck. He then struggled even harder when he felt the tiger working at his jean shorts to remove them...

You grunt a little at the trashing legs, but you don't let that stop you from pulling off the jean shorts and underwear of the buck. You set the jean shorts aside, feeling a wallet in them, and toss the underwear in with the shirt you had discarded in the trash. You hear the wails of the buck inside you, and chuckle inwardly, loving the way the sound vibrated in your greedy body. To tease him, you slurp at his bare crotch, amused when you feel him get aroused.

As much as you'd like to tease him until he came, the edgy feeling wins out. You swallow his hips, and slurp up the bucks kicking, wriggling legs easily. You lap at his hooves for a moment and then gulp them down, sending the buck to his fate inside your cavernous belly.

You belch, patting your huge, fat stomach, which hasn't grown at all from the meal it just ate. That's part of why you like being so fat, as it makes it easy to keep a meal 'under wraps.' You feel your powerful stomach start to churn, the buck desperately wriggling about, kicking at your bellywalls as he starts to be digested into more fat.

Smacking your lips again, you look through the buck's wallet, finding a decent amount of cash and a few credit cards. You break the credit cards and put the cash in your own wallet, stuffed into your tight-fitting cloth shorts (which also double as a swimsuit), and toss the shorts away in the trash. Meals didn't need clothes.

Feeling more confident now that someone is in your belly, you have an internal debate with yourself about your next move. Do you try for the bunny boy twins that were so wrapped up in their game? It's close to the door, and the game is arranged so that you could overwhelm them without anyone seeing...

Or do you give into your instincts and flee? There are other people in the park to eat, no need to risk getting eaten yourself...
12331.title: Try to eat the DDR buck before leaving...

choices: Head to the Bathroom to jerk off to the bucks last moments of life
Go to the haunted Mansion  Ride
123312.content:
Feeling the bucks struggles continue in your flabby gut you quickly reach a decision, eating to many folks in one place is probably just asking for trouble, you can't just assume things'll go as easy.... your hunger isn't quite as ravenous after your appetizer afterall.. he was rather a delicious one of course, flavor stil on your lips. No one being the wiser you slide from the arcade door and into the fresh air again, feeling a strong kick from your stomach you let out a grunt before giving it a squeeze.. It'll be over soon enough, always is.

You meander slowly through the busy theme park, gleefulness at your bellys murderous appetite being mistaken for being excited about the rides.. But perhaps you are that too.. nothing like having all sorts of fun.. Unfortunately most of the rides fall into one of two categories, you are A) To big to safely ride, or B) the lines are to long...and eating your way to the head of the line would certainly cause a stir. You stop by a snack stand and pick up three chilly dogs and a coupe sodas, using the bucks own money of course, and then taking a seat to dine before he's even stopped wiggling, dousing him in soda and hot dog remains...while you greedily chow down... feeling your belly give another rumble you muffle a happy laugh, watching so many delicious folk wander by, yearning to snack on each and everyone one.. as soon as you finish your little snack you get onto your feet again and start to walk..


As you saunter around, trying to look rather innocent you realize that the athletic bucks struggles are having a effect on your libido.. you going to be soon sporting a tent and that would certainly attract way to much attention for your liking.. maybe you can mentally force it to recede even with such nice stimulation... and until that happens go to the haunted mansion ride, at least the queue is inside, and dark, no one will see the naughtiness.... or maybe its time to go to the bathroom for some private time with your meal......
123312.title: Exit discreetly.  There's lots of prey here...

choices: Option 1.) Self-pleasure and then hunting...
Option 2.) A sexy, sex-hungry meal comes to you...
1233122.content:
After thinking about it for a moment, you decide to head to the Haunted Mansion. You've never felt a feeling of danger from that area of the park before, and it'd be a good place to discreetly relieve your growing hard-on. You chuckle, patting your massive gut, purring at the struggles of the buck as he slowly succumbs to your digestive processes, and saunter up to the line.

The queue is thankfully short, and you are soon inside the mansion.

You grin widely. This attraction isn't like your normal haunted mansions, where there's a set path to follow. It's more of a wide open sandbox, which scares available in almost every room, scares that get progressively worse if you're dumb enough to stay. The 'horrors' were designed to eventually heard you to the exit, the actors all skilled enough to scare even the hardiest of guests, the special effects almost Hollywood-quality. If someone was foolish enough to stay in a room long enough, they would be ejected from the house via a trap door, which sent them on a slide to a pit of rubber balls to catch them. It bypassed the gift shop and restaurant at the exit of the house and the better 'scare' rooms, so it was considered a foolish thing to stay in a room long enough to activate the trap door. It had a reputation as the scariest haunted house attraction in the country.

But it also had another reputation: as a primo makeout spot.

There were a few 'monster-free' areas, where people would sometimes go to have sexy fun. And you knew where all of them were. Perfect to find some relief for the growing tent in your pants (and if you were lucky, some action as well, and maybe a meal).

You decide to visit some of the scare rooms first, so you don't give yourself away by heading straight for the makeout spot. You notice a mother rabbit and her teenage daughter come running out of a room upstairs, screaming and giggling. They are then chased down the hallway into another area by a 'spirit' under the floor making the boards bulge up as it went after them.

Grinning, you head out of the main lobby, where a deliberatley cheesy voice is 'warning' people of the dangers, and head for a nearby room. You find yourself in what looks like a lounge, with tables, a piano, and a bookshelf nearby. Almost immediately the creepiness starts, the candles igniting themselves, the cigarette case on one table opening by itself, a cigarette floating out and lighting on one of the candles, an invisible figure seemingly 'smoking' the cigarette.

You feel an excited chill go through you. You'd been in this room before and still hadn't figured out how they did that...

A piano started playing, the song one that had been going through his head for days. Another dose of creepy. You grin, you love this house...

And then a voice began whispering in his ears.

~We know what you did. We know what you did.~

It's creepy as hell, but you love it. You always did like horror movies, and this house was like a living o...

~We know what you did in the arcade...~

Ohshit...

~We know what you did to that buck...~

Ohshitohshitohshit...

~We know WHAT YOU ARE...~

A ghostly hand gripped you on the shoulder. You promptly haul your ample ass out of the room, moving faster than anyone your size had a right to, not wanting to deal with that any further. Still, it was a great scare... This place never failed to impress.

===============
Elsewhere...
===============

A voice snickered. "Preds are always easiest to scare," said the younger female voice, "Especially big successful ones like that."

"Still," said the older female voice, "He's good. He instinctively knows to avoid areas where preds big enough to swallow him are. And even with you in the arcade, watching him, he managed to get a meal before escaping."

The younger voice purred. "You think we might be able to use him in the new attraction?"

To your horror, however, you can't get a good grip, can't get your huge, prey-fattened stomach over the doorway. Clawing desperately, you struggle to get up, the pred in the floor getting close enough for his breath to be felt on your ass. ...And then something you never expect happened. The mare you had been thinking about eating, along with a burly bear with a light Russian accent, reached down and grabbed your shoulders, starting to pull you up. The two braced themselves on the door frame, yanking with all their might to save you. Not really understanding why, but by no means questioning their kindess, you struggle as best you can, your claws tearing up the wall as you are slowly, but steadily, pulled up onto the floor. Once your belly is past the gap, you scramble the rest of the way through and kick the door shut.

The three of you collapse on the floor, panting for breath. Behind the door, the sound of furniture moving and a loud creaking, as if a large door were closing, followed by a click came through the doorway.

"You..." panted the bear, "Are FUCKING heavy. I really hope that's a prey gut, because I really don't want to have to have saved a lazy fatass."

You roll your eyes. "Trust me, all of this flab is from people I've eaten. But thanks for saving me back there..."

The bear snorted. "Looks like the rumors are true about this place, then," he said.

The mare smirked. "That just makes it interesting, Bobby..."

Bobby growled. "I'd rather eat than get eaten, Sally," he rumbled.

"You and me both, brother," you mutter. Meanwhile, you noticed a notebook, a marker, and some tape inside a nearby desk. "I'll fix whomever that was," you say, picking up the notebook and writing something on it. Bobby and Sally looked on curiously as your tore the page out and taped it to the door, giggling when they read the sign.

"OUT OF ORDER"

"Beautiful," Sally said, "I love it!"

You chuckle, proud of your work. "Now that that's done," you say, "I'm getting out of here."

"Amen," Bobby muttered, "C'mon Sal, let's get out of here, go on a couple rides."

"And then back to the hotel room for some more rides," Sally said, whickering. "You wanna join us?"

You shake your head. "Nah, I'm too big for most of the rides. Plus I got really bad acrophobia."

Bobby shrugged. "Then how about we meet later at the hotel? Neither of us are averse to threesomes," he said.

"Well what do you know? Someone who thought they could sneak their way in here by eating an employee and stealing their access card," said a purring voice.

Before you can react, a massive mouth closes over the top of your head. You panic, screaming loudly, pushing at the jaws engulfing you... when they suddenly withdraw, revealing that they belong to a massive non-anthro black panther, visibly amused at your fear.

"Relax, kid, I'm teasing. If I was going to eat you, you'd be in my belly by now," he rumbled.

You stagger back, panting and grinning weakly. "Um... Are you...?"

The panther nodded. "I'm the one from the room that you nearly got caught in. Shame you didn't, you look like a juicy morsel." You start to panic again, and he says, "Relax. Like I said, if I was gonna eat you, you'd be eaten by now."

"...Forgive me if that doesn't give me any comfort..." you say.

The panther grinned, the wide, toothy maw making you shiver in fear. You hate being around people bigger than you. "I'd be disappointed if it did. But in any rate, I think I like you, kiddo. Neat trick with the Out of Order sign."

You pale visibly underneath your fur. "You knew about that?"

The panther snickered. "Of course. All the paintings are rigged up over security cameras. The sign's already been removed," he said, "and I've already had a meal from that room. I'm just impressed that you had the guts to try and stick it to me after nearly being eaten. Most survivors just panic and run."

You shake your head, starting to calm down. "Panicking just makes you even more careless you were before. I've had several meals that were on the run and panicking, all of them not looking where they were going until it was too late and they became bellyfat."

The panther nodded sagely. "True, true. Hey, listen, can I ask you a favor?"

You blink, confused. "Um... If it'll ensure me not getting eaten, then okay."

The panther sighed in relief. "I promised a friend of mine I'd be there when she checks out of the hospital today, and I got clearance from the bosses to do so. Problem is, I don't got anyone to cover for me in the trap room. You mind filling in for the rest of my shift? You look like you got the stomach capacity," the panther asked.

You look through the darkened hallways leading to the trap rooms. It's a tempting offer. Plus, if it came down to a choice between possibly annoying a panther large enough to eat you by saying no or getting free meals, then the choice was obvious.

"Sure thing, sounds like fun," you say.

The panther grinned, and nodded. "Thanks, I owe you. Hey, if you're interested in working for us for real, put in an application before you leave. It's fun work, plus I get a paycheck bonus for referring someone. You can keep whatever you take off of anyone you eat, I'll put in a good word for you with the bosses. I'll even make sure that you get a free room tonight with no pred charges, in case you want to stay 'til tomorrow."

You blinked. "'Pred charges?'"

The panther shook his head in amusement. "You wouldn't believe how many preds try to get a free room by eating a tenant. Like I said, the paintings are security cameras, so we charge any pred that thinks they can sneak a free overnight stay by eating someone."

You grin weakly. "Thanks for the tip," you say, the panther chuckling and walking off.

"My room's 7U on the first floor," he says, "A costumer there will help you get set up and show you how to trigger the traps."

You nod, and waddle into the hallway, relieved that you weren't eaten and eagerly anticipating the meals to come.

The otter's legs kicked wildly in the air, as your tongue tasted him briefly before you started to work in his legs. Soon his feet were in your mouth and after a few more swallows they disappeared down your throat as well.

Your stomach bulged out at least a foot as the otter's weight landed inside it. You smiled to yourself and licked your lips as you felt the otter wiggle around in panic inside your belly.

With the otter taken care of you moved forward in the line to take his vacated space. Then you reached forward and tapped the shoulder of the small lizard woman in front of you.

"Would you mind if I cut in front of you?" You asked her with a smile on your face as you secretly hoped she’d say no. That otter wasn't even an appetizer for your immense belly.

Unfortunately the lizard woman had seen what happened to the otter so she nervously replied, "N-no I don't mind! You can cut in front of me!"

"Thanks." You replied as you move in front of her. You then repeated the process over and over again as you asked the people in front of you if you could cut in front of them. Anyone who said no quickly ended up inside your belly. In no time at all you were at the front of the line for the coaster with a bulging and wriggling belly that almost reached your knees.

"Next." The roller coaster attendant said.

You smile widely as you take a seat in the first car.
13121.title: Cutting The Line

choices: You manage to hold on.. but are  shell shocked
Your grips rip away, claws still in them, you fall. SHIT.
131212.content:
Maybe that attendant should have said something.. but you knew you'd have eaten him. By the time the restraints came down on your stomach and bounced back it was to late, with a gulp you grab the side of the car and cling on. you KNOW this ride, and it isn't a soft one, your stomach lurches as if to drive home this fact, you hold your jaws closed, grit your teeth.

Your off, 60 miles per hour, no restraints, you feel yourself swung around and nearly out three times, the speed is actually helpful, banking designed to keep people from falling out does a good job, you manage the first loop at insane speed, the otter almost back in your mouth after, then you remember th BIG loop is coming, and it slows up alot near the top. you cling on for dear life with all your limbs. You get a wonderful view of the park. The fact that it might be your last one is all to glaring in your mind though.. As you near the top you feel yourself starting to fall
131212.title: Eepp..Bad idea?

choices: Your concused and pass out
Ouch.. Someone comes to investigate
1312122.content: The final massive loop in the ride is your last, you kept your grip, but your weight wasn't supported enough, your claws to strong and in the end you come out of the car, hitting your head, then your back then your knee, all before your clean of the wrecked car, you slam through the railing, splintering wood and bending the steel, providing massive bruises on your body already, Splinters lodge in your fur as you finally fall clear, bouncing a bit and feeling like you've broken a bone or two before you land on the ground with a tremendous thud, pain shoots through your body as the wreckage crumbles around you...
1312122.title: Dropping through a Ride

choices: Get a closer look at the strange ride
Look for another ride
13122.content:
You grumble to yourself as you step away from the long roller coaster line in search of a shorter one. For 20 minutes you walk around the park searching for a ride with a short line, but everywhere you go you only find longer and longer lines.

Until you suddenly come across a roller coaster with no line. The ride's tracks lead underground so you can't tell what the ride is like.

The roller coaster has the odd name of Dragon's Hunger, but what's really strange about this ride is the fact that it isn't on the amusement park map.

"Maybe it's still under construction?" You wonder aloud as you gaze at the ride.
13122.title: Dragon's Hunger Roller Coaster

131221.content:
You decide that you might as well see if the ride is open so you walk through the empty line until you reach the coaster's platform.

To your surprise and joy you see that the ride is indeed open as you spot the roller coaster's attendant who smiles as you approach.

"You're my first customer of the day." The horse wearing the amusement park uniform said to you as you approached.

You nod as he leads you to the empty roller coaster car waiting at the platform.

After he closes the safety restraints you say, "I've never heard of this ride before. What's it like?"

The coaster attendant smiles as he pushes the button to start the ride and says, "It's a real stomach filler."

"Don't you mean stomach churner?" You ask the attendant, but unfortunately the car left the station before he could answer.

The coaster car climbed up the lift hill and you screamed in excitement as the car reached the top and started to plunge downward. The tracks lead straight down into an underground tunnel.

The underground tunnel opened up into a large underground cave and your scream of excitement turned into a scream of terror at what you saw. The cave was filled with by the mass of a huge black dragon and the track of the roller coaster ended right in front of the dragon's open mouth!

Right before the roller coaster car left the track and flew into the dragon's waiting gullet a camera connected to the track took a picture of you.

GULP!

...

The roller coaster attendant looked down at the picture he held in his hands and chuckled. The picture showed the look of pure terror on your face moments before you ended up in the dragon's belly.

The roller coaster attendant opened up a scrapbook and put your picture next to those of several other unfortunate victims.
131221.title: Roller Coasters Can Be Dangerous

choices: Take a look at the "character" people in suits
Go For a bite to eat
Take a look in the funhouse
look for a thrill ride
Start off with something a bit tamer
14.content: You stretch your legs and bask in the sun, This theme park is supposed to be an experiance of a lifetime, it certainly costs enough, you almost feel violated from the cashectomy you suffered. the pain is over and the park stretches out in front of you. Looking at your guidemap you mentally mark off a few things that look good...
14.title: Cost a mint, but now your in

choices: Your mischevious, sneak up and give em a shot in the groin
Wait in line for a chance to interact, maybe the line'll hurry up
141.content:
While most people go to the rides first you decide to take a more leisurely look at one of the parks mascots. Taking a quick left turn you find there are a few. Each seems to be patting a young child's head, signing autographs and other such stuff.
The lines are pretty long so you end up just picking the shortest,starting to wait for a chance to meet 'Bongo the Bear" You soon start to realize that the line isn't moving, ten minutes and he is still making the same kid laugh and giggle. Finally that kid is finished, letting you move one step forward, at this rate it'll be 3pm before you get your chance.. Grumbling angrily you wonder why this guy in a suit is such a draw.

What to do
141.title: Time to look at the Mascot

choices: Spitting out the hot dog, you turn back, furious, to the vendor
Gagging at this revelation, you realise there is someone at your elbow
Chewing thoughtfully, you turn with a small smile to the vendor
142.content:
You spot a battered old hot dog stand nearby. There is no queue. You stroll over and - without meaning to - make eye contact with the owner as you approach. A short, long-haired, scruffy man with tired eyes. Neither the hot dog stand nor the owner inspire much confidence, but you're hungry.

Smiling, hoping for a response: "Your finest hot dog, my good man"
Unsmiling, tired "Just one sort. All we got. Do you want it?"
Faltering: "Um..OK"

He starts fiddling under the counter and you realise that the hot dogs aren't on display - that's unusual. Just cans of coke on the counter, an old radio, a newspaper.

He passes you the hotdog. The bun's a bit stale-looking, but it's smothered in red sauce - unusual colour for tomato - and yellow sauce - must be mustard.

Turning around and leaning on the counter, you look around, taking in the rest of the fairground and raise the hotdog to your mouth, biting into it.

It tastes OK and you bite again, chewing and swallowing. Glancing down at the meat of the hot dog, you notice - God! - an eyelid, complete with eyelashes in the meat. Only half remains.
142.title: Go For a bite to eat

choices: You wake up in some sort of display case
You wake up on a conveyer belt
You wake up in a dark room
1421.content:
"Oh god -- !" You gag, bits of chewed hotdog falling from your mouth in disgusting wet lumps as you desperately try to choke out what you've eaten. "What the hell did you put in my-" You yell, spinning around in fury towards the vendor, but your words were interrupted by what would have been a horrified yell, which had in turn been interrupted by a hard, metal object smashing you in the face.

You were sent flying onto the ground behind you, barely choking out a breath as you land on the tough gravel in pain that's almost unfeelable. You couldn't think, you couldn't move- you could only feel your face grow cold, as if it's full of ice, as you listen to the sounds of the vender exitting the booth and walking towards you.

You raise a hand, your fingers outstretched in an instinctive plead for mercy, as you start to lift your head in an attempt to crawl away- to no avail. The object comes down on your face again, harder this time, devastating your face as it slams the back of your head onto the shape gravel floor. With that, everything went dark.
1421.title: Spitting out the hot dog, you turn back, furiou...

choices: continue
14211.content: You wake up in a display case, with furs looking in on you.
14211.title: You wake up in some sort of display case

choices: Ask for another
Ask where it came from
Something hits you in the head
1423.content:
You stared at the eyelash. You were shocked, but you made an attempt to conceal that. You had heard the rumors and seen the proof. Hell, the name itself dropped what could be considered a hint. It's not like it's your inexperienced with this- you've dined on a person or two in your past. So why did this feel wrong?

You tentatively picked up the eyelash, and flicked it away like a normal piece of trash. For the rest of your life you wondered whether it was wrong that you turned back to him, and smiled lightly at him. The expression he returned couldnt be read. You didn't try. You just turned around, and went back to your hotdog, savoring the taste as you tried not to think about it.
1423.title: Chewing thoughtfully, you turn with a small smi...

choices: A female anthro horse, in the "mood".
A normal cow, also in the mood.
143.content:
You decide on the fun house.

Using your map, you reach it. The first thing you notice is that there is quite a queue, all men. Odd.

The line moves slowly. Whenever a man comes out, he looks significantly happier than when he went in.

Eventually, its your turn. You go up to the booth, show your special areas pass (its worth the money) and go through the turnstile.

Its rather dark.

You look around, expecting to find the way to the next room, when a firgure steps out from the shadows.

It is...
143.title: The "fun" house.

choices: They pull you off to the side
The middle aged woman
The college girl
144.content:
You make your way to a sign that reads "Journey to Kelly" thinking that this must be some sort of adventure ride, you make your way down the the path and to the house looking building that was the entrance. When you step in the building the wait line seems to be that resembling a house, and you are behind a middle aged blonde woman and in front of a college brunette.

You get to the front of the line and are seated with
144.title: look for a thrill ride

choices: You're being stalked by an employee...
You have an encounter with an affectionate pregnant employee...
You meet up with an employee who offers you a chance to go someplace secret...
145.content: Not in the mood for anything exciting right now, you decided to just explore the park and take in the sights. Humans and furs milled about, heading for rides or attractions. You noticed that almost all of the employees of the park were female furs, many of them plump or pregnant-seeming. Chuckling a little to yourself, you continued to wander, seemingly oblivious to everything around you...
145.title: Start off with something a bit tamer

choices: ...head for the video arcade, wanting to meet a friend there.
...head for the rides, having heard great things about them.
...head for the food court.  You're STARVING.
...head for some games, to see if you can win some prizes.
...are secretly a fur-eating pred with plans to binge.
15.content:
You're a lovely human woman, here to enjoy yourself at the park. You've heard rumors about this park, which you've never been to before, but either think they're just rumors or are confident enough in yourself to handle them. You aren't afraid of the furs that attend here, having gone 18 years without being molested or eaten by a pred. That's made you pretty easygoing around them, and given you many friends in the furry community.

You get in easily, having thought ahead and bought a season pass. You go inside, and look around, grinning?

You...
15.title: A human Female

info.brief_description: Visiting this theme park might be the last thing you ever do...
info.description:
You play the roll of someone in a theme park, its huge and the scope is greater than any four parks put together, interesting rides, interesting tastes. Many possibilities to try out for the adventure. Watch out for those workers though, they might be hungry..
(more to come later)

Visiting this theme park might be the last thing you ever do, or the most satisfying experiences of your life.. which will it be.?
info.pretty_title: The Theme Park of The Hungry
